mapper.insert: INSERT INTO dns_records(zone_id,cf_record_id,name,type,content,ttl,proxied) VALUES(#{zoneId},#{cfRecordId},#{name},#{type},#{content},#{ttl},#{proxied}) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE name=VALUES(name),type=VALUES(type),content=VALUES(content),ttl=VALUES(ttl),proxied=VALUES(proxied)
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(1) FROM dns_records WHERE zone_id=#{zoneId} AND name=#{name}
SELECT * FROM dns_records WHERE zone_id=#{zoneId} AND name=#{name} ORDER BY id DESC LIMIT 1
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM dns_records WHERE zone_id=#{zoneId} AND cf_record_id=#{cfRecordId}
DELETE FROM dns_records WHERE zone_id=#{zoneId} AND name=#{name}
mapper.select: SELECT type, COUNT(*) as count FROM dns_records GROUP BY type
